cast.overview: Jack Carter is a small-time hood working in London. When word reaches him of his brother's death, he travels to Newcastle to attend the funeral. Refusing to accept the police report of suicide, Carter seeks out his brother’s friends and acquaintances to learn who murdered his sibling and why.
cast.title: Get Carter

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Alexander "Sandy" Morton (born 24 March 1945 in Glasgow) is a Scottish actor.
